short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your go-to memo manager. Quickly save your temporary thoughts using Local Storage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
How Does it Work?
DB Memo Pad uses local storage to instantly save text entered in textarea inputs on your device.
1. Active Tabs: Displays the tabs in use among the 15 available, helping in managing your memos.
2. Search Memos: Quickly locate specific content across all memos with a search feature, presented in an alert popup.
3. Below the textarea input, find:
-- Copy Memo: Copies text from the active memo tab to the clipboard.
-- Clear Memo: Clears text from the active memo.
--  Save .txt: Saves all memos to a 'Memos.txt' file for local storage.
-- Clear All: Deletes all memos across every tab, irreversible action.
4. BK/RC Tab: Offers a backup and restore system for all memos. Additional buttons include:
-- Backup?: Fetches and displays all local storage Key/Values for DB Memo Pad in the textarea input.
-- Save Backup .txt?: Saves all local storage data to 'Memo-Codes.txt' for local storage.
-- Replace?: Restores memos from 'Memo-Codes.txt'. Simply copy text data from the file and paste it into the Backup Recovery Codes input, then press Replace.

Privacy
- This extension does not gather any personal information or browsing history from users.  0 Tracking, 0 data collection.
- Users can rest assured that their browsing activities remain private and are not monitored or shared with any third parties.
- The extension does not require any libraries linked outside of the extension aka "remote code".  Just requires the browser's local storage to save your settings.

Changlog/Bug Fixes:
https://destructiveburn.com/forum/public/d/22-db-memo-pad-changelog-news

More About the Extension here:
